Game.Name: Override (Japan)
Game.plot: Sci-fi vertically scrolling shoot 'em up.HINTS:- Level select mode -Enter the "Level Select Mode" code before entering the level password.Hold Run and press Select ten times- Sound Test, Invincibility and Ending -(At the title Screen, reset 10 times and then enter the following codes at the title screen)Holding up-left, I, II, Select, press Run : EndingPress Run, then quickly press and hold I, II, Select & Run : InvincibilityHold Select and press Run : Sound Testhttp://www.pcengine.co.uk/HTML_Games/Override.htmCheat: LevelsEnter the "Level Select Mode" code before entering any of the other level passwords.Cheat: LevelsAt the title Screen, reset 10 times and then enter the following codes at the title screen
Game.Notes: A vertical shoot 'em up with a sci-fi setting that sees brave pilot Kein/Kain Asagiri take on the alien forces that have attacked planet Uranos in his combat hover tank Gigaiasu. The game was initially released on the PC Engine in the January of 1991 and adapted with additional scenes for the Sharp X68000 home computer in the November of that year, where its name was changed to Last Battalion. The goal of the game is to reach the end of each stage, where the player must fight the boss to progress. The game has six stages in total of increasing difficulty.
